channel.title: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I got few questions about upgrading Whonix 16.
After I installing whonix-ws-16 and whonix-gw-16 template, how should I configure sys-whonix ? Should I change Template in **qube settings to "whonix-gw-16"** or should I create new "sys-whonix" ?
And my second questin is: When I try to delete whonix-ws-15 or whonix-gw-15 I get this error: **VM installed by package manager:whonix-ws-15**

item.title: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Polyguy1:

Should I change Template in qube settings to “whonix-gw-16”

How-to: Install the Stable Version of Qubes-Whonix ™ 16

After the Qubes-Whonix ™ installation has finished, it is recommended to manually change the setting of any App Qubes still using Qubes-Whonix ™ 15 Templates to the Qubes-Whonix ™ 16 Templates. [4]

Read full topic
item.source: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?

item.title: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?
item.dc:creator: Polyguy1
item.description:
@Patrick thanks for reply.

You can change my username to “Polyguy1” and sry for breaking that rule, it was first thing that came to my mind lol.

So you are saying that I should change template in qube settins of sys-whonix right ?

Read full topic
item.source: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?

item.title: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

Since it’s highly unlikely you are what your user name is… Impersonating is forbidden as per the policy of this website.

Whonix – 22 Sep 21

Policy of Whonix ™ Website and Whonix ™ Chat

Whonix ™ Platform Goals, Whonix ™ Website and Chat Goals, Whonix ™ Website and Chat Non-Purposes, Usage Rules, Unwanted Topics, Banned Subjects

I must insist that you either provide proof of identity (which I guess is extremely unlikely to happen) or change your user name. You can write a new user name here and I’ll change it for you.

Polyguy1:

should I create new “sys-whonix” ?

“Unrelated.” This isn’t recommended just because of the release upgrade. It’s neither recommended nor discouraged. If you wanted that for Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation, you’d be better off with a complete un-installation of Qubes-Whonix and a re-installation as documented.

Polyguy1:

When I try to delete whonix-ws-15 or whonix-gw-15 I get this error: VM installed by package manager:whonix-ws-15

This is as per Qubes default. Unspecific to Qubes-Whonix. Same issue would happen when attempting to remove debian-10 template (because you installed debian-11 template).

See;

Qubes OS

Templates

In Getting Started, we covered the distinction in Qubes OS between where you install your software and where you run your software. Your software is installed in templates. Each template shares its root filesystem (i.e., all of its programs and...

What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not. Qubes-Whonix
As a rule of thumb: Everything that happens “inside” the virtual machines is Qubes-Whonix and belongs into this sub forum. Everything that happens “outside” the virtual machine is Qubes and the Qubes help should be consulted. Some examples: EFI → Qubes support Errors by by Qubes VM Manager (QVMM) → Qubes support libvirtError → Qubes support Issues that also apply to Debian based VMs. → Qubes support error: Failed to save domain whonix-ws-dvm to /var/lib/qubes/appvms/whonix-ws-dvm/dvm-…
Whonix – 26 Sep 21

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

This might be helpful but it isn’t an exact answer:

Whonix – 23 Sep 21

Uninstall Qubes-Whonix ™

How to uninstall Qubes-Whonix ™.

Read full topic
item.source: After installing whonix-16 on qubes what should I do with sys-whonix?
